mapper.select: select * from sys_depart where id IN ( select dep_id from sys_user_depart where user_id = #{userId} )
SELECT * FROM sys_depart WHERE id IN ( SELECT dep_id FROM sys_user_depart WHERE user_id = ( SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} ) )
select id from sys_depart where del_flag = '0' and org_code like concat((select org_code from sys_depart where id=#{departId}),'%')

select id from sys_depart where del_flag = '0' and
org_code LIKE CONCAT(#{item},'%')
SELECT sg.id as id, sg.depart_name as title, sg.parent_id as pid, REPLACE(md5(uuid()), '-', '') as 'key' FROM sys_depart sg WHERE sg.del_flag = 0 AND sg.parent_id=''

SELECT sd.id AS id, sd.parent_id AS pid, sd.depart_name AS title, 'false' as is_user, '' as phone, REPLACE(md5(uuid()), '-', '') as 'key' FROM sys_depart sd UNION ALL SELECT su.id AS id, sud.parent_id AS pid, su.name AS title, 'true' as is_user, su.phone as phone, REPLACE(md5(uuid()), '-', '') as 'key' FROM sl_address_book su LEFT JOIN sys_depart sud ON sud.id= su.dep_id where sud.id is not null
